title: Brand New Luxury House for Sale in Piliyandala
details:
Newly Build Architect Design Luxury House for Sale at Batakettara, Piliyandala. Close to Batakettara Buddhist Temple and Sathosa.

Built on 15 Perches Land and approx. 3,860 Sq.Ft of floor area, consist 4 Rooms
2 Attached Bathrooms & 2 Bath Common Rooms, Living Room, Dining Room,
Kitchen & Pantry, Kitchen & Pantry Competed with Teak Wood
